purpose: To provide a comprehensive toolkit for monitoring AI agents, tracking costs associated with large language models (LLMs), and benchmarking performance across different agent frameworks.
principle: To enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of AI agents by providing tools that facilitate monitoring, evaluation, and cost management while ensuring seamless integration with popular LLMs and agent frameworks.
reusability: Designed to be modular and extensible, allowing developers to integrate the SDK into various projects and frameworks without significant modifications.
limitations: Currently in alpha status, which may imply incomplete features, potential instability, and the need for further testing before production use.
name: agentops
description: Python SDK for AI agent monitoring, LLM cost tracking, benchmarking, and more. Integrates with most LLMs and agent frameworks including OpenAI Agents SDK, CrewAI, Langchain, Autogen, AG2, and CamelAI
